mention.text: medellin , 23 mar 90 -- diego montana cuellar , president of the patriotic union
a letter signed by pablo escobar gaviria , in which he emphatically denies any participation in the assassination of bernardo jaramillo ossa
the assassination of bernardo jaramillo ossa
his letter to the up , escobar gaviria disavows those calls , stating : why should i attack someone who was firmly opposed to colombia surrendering to the united states ?
telephone calls in which an alleged spokesmen of the medellin cartel claimed responsibility for the assassination of jaramillo ossa
